files.description: Python automation script that generates or updates outputs/roadmap_v1.md to satisfy the stated acceptance criteria including adding a self-verification checklist at the bottom.

Command-line validator that checks outputs/roadmap_v1.md for required sections (scope, timebox, targets, definition) and presence of the bottom checklist, failing with actionable messages if criteria are unmet.
Completed roadmap document updated to match the acceptance criteria and containing a bottom-of-file checklist to self-verify required elements are present.
Project usage documentation explaining how to run the generation and validation scripts and how the acceptance criteria are enforced.

missionDescription: Complete /outputs/roadmap_v1.md to match the stated acceptance criteria and add a checklist at the bottom to self-verify (scope/timebox/targets/definition present).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
